name: Touhou Spider Bites
description:
A Touhou Halloween Extravaganza!

There’s a Halloween party happening in former hell! Yamame’s eager to make some delicious Halloween treats for the party, but doesn’t know what to make… Leave it to the Kirisame Delivery Service to bring several different ingredients! As Yamame, it’s your job to figure out what “ghostly” meals to make for the “goblin’s” party. With work from eleven different people!

Puzzle-based Cooking

Use your deduction skills to  find the right recipes to make for the party! Use your guest list, recipe book, and ingredients to determine what meals to make.

Costumes and Artists

Each meal you make is loved by a certain Touhou character, and that character will be wearing a Halloween costume Drawn by a different artist! Cook all the meals to see all the costumes!

Credits

  • DemoReel: Ingredient Artist, Rinnosuke Costume (https://twitter.com/24hrcallcentre)
  • illusorybread: Main Food Artist (https://twitter.com/illusorybread)
